112.content:
Randy swung the front door open, he was the first one home from school; Brad had gone to soccer practice and would be home a little later. Mark was off skateboarding, but he was undpredictable as to when he'd be back.

Randy threw his bag on the sofa and kicked his sneakers off, before walking through to the kitchen. He opened the fridge and pulled out a tupperware box. It was something his mom had made, which didn't bode well for him, but there was nothing else in the fridge.
He opened the lid and dipped his finger in. He couldn't tell what it was at first, and then he put his finger in his mouth; it was peppery, but he couldn't place what it was.

He walked out of the kitchen, and back into the living room, but as he reached the sofa, he started to feel a little woozy. He put one hand to his head, the other to steady himself on the sofa, then he passed out.

As he came to, his vision was blurry, he noticed two gigantic structures in front of him. As his eyes focused, he could tell that they were in fact his size 10 sneakers, which he had just kicked off only ten minutes or so earlier. As he lay there, his brain worked overtime and he worked out, judging by his size compared to his sneaker, that he was about three inches tall. His brain also old him that being on the floor at that size was dangerous.

Just as he was getting to his feet, he noticed two things; one, he was still fully clothed, and the other was that he heard the front door opening. His mom was at work, as was his dad, so that only left his older brother, soccer stud Brad or his younger brother, skateboarding goth Mark....

Choose quick, the door is almost open....
112.title: Randy's the smallest Taylor - now he LITERALLY

choices: Brad leaves Randy on the desk in his room while he takes a shower
Brad just puts on some fresh clothes and makes Randy play with his size 14 feet
1121.content:
As his older brother pounds through the door, Randy notices that his brother is wearing his soccer uniform. His brother was an intemidating guy standing at 6'2" tall but now he was like a titan as he stepped into the kitchen where is tiny brother sat at the edge of his own shoes. Brad noticed them lying on the floor and bent over to pick em up before someone fell on them, "What the...," his brother boomed.

         The next thing Randy knew he was being scooped up by his collasal brother's hand. "Randy is that you?", Brad asked in astonishment.

         "Yes! Its me Brad you have to help me.", Randy yelled to his brother.

         "Now why should I help you after all the trouble you get me in?", said Brad, "Better yet I think I'll keep you for a while and play with you... I always thought it would be cool to have a little guy to play with."

          After that with his little brother's shoes in hand and his cleats and soccer bag in the other Brad walks upstairs.
1121.title: Found by Brad

choices: As Mark walks to his room, his skater shoe comes off and lands near to Randy
Brad opens the door, and tries to find Randy, getting in Mark's way
11212.content:
Brad dropped his soccer bag and cleats next to his bed, and dropped Randy's shoes on his bed. Looking down at his tiny brother, he smiled
"I'll have to put you somewhere whilst I change!" Brad smirked, and promptly dropped him into his left soccer cleat. He then went to his closet to choose what to wear.

Inside the cleat, Randy tried not to heave. It smelt absoloutely vile in here, like Brad's locker at school, only a million times worse. As he looked around the worn cleat, all he could see was worn out leather and fabric. As he looked at the size 14US tag on the tongue, he shivered at the thought of coming face to face, or face to foot in this case, with those monstrous things. His thoughts were rudely interrupted by the return of his giant brother. Brad had finished getting changed

Brad tilted the shoe and sent Randy sprawling onto the floor. He rubbed his arm and looked up. Brad was standing up, at his full height of 6 foot 2 inches.
Randy gulped, he knew that there was no chance Brad was going to help him. His eyes then saw something that had made him shiver earlier; Brad's bare size 14's were right in front of him. Brad saw him staring at them

"You're staring at my pups? You dirty little pervert!" Brad scoffed, and nudged Randy with his big toe. Randy fell flat on his butt, and looked up as Brad began to lower his foot on top of Randy, and then slowly began to roll Randy side to side underneath it. Randy tried to get his hands up to somehow stop the giant wall of flesh moving him around, but to no avail.

Brad seemed to be enjoying this, when his cellphone began to ring. He removed his foot from his exhausted tiny sibling and walked to his desk to answer it. Randy sat up, slowly. Brad had sat in his chair to talk to his friend. Randy saw this as a chance to try and get away.

He got to his feet and making sure he stayed out of Brad's eyeline, he ran for the doorway. He reached it, and rolled underneath the huge pine door and onto the landing. He sighed with relief, but what now? Maybe Mark would be able to help him, although the amount that Brad and Randy had picked on him over the years, that wasn't likely, but it's gotta be better than Brad! As Randy was thinking it, the front door slammed downstaits, and heavy footsteps started to walk up the stairs. It wasn't his mom or dad, they were both out still, and Brad was in his room, so that meant only one thing......

Mark was home.

125.content:
It had been a great summer for Kyle. He'd had some great evenings with Kerry, walking along the beach, sitting on the grass, going to parties, making fun of Bridget, and now he was going round to see her. He'd really been looking forward to it all day, as he'd been working hard at the sports store, now it was time to see his girl.

As Kyle walked up the path towards the Hennesee house, a wierd rush ran over him. He dropped to his knees and clutched at his head.
"Arrgh! Jeez, what's going on?" He staggered forwards and finally collapsed on the door step. Kyle closed his eyes and blacked out.

"This evening sucks!" said Rory, as he was coming home from basketball practice, and was a little dejected. He wasn't in the squad for tommorow's game, and that was annoying him. He knew he was better than the other guy they picked. As the fourteen year old trudged up the path, he saw something on the doorstep. Something small, something action figure sized, something like....
"What the...Kyle?" Rory said, "What happenned to you?"
When Kyle didn't respond, Rory grinned
"This could be a fun evening after all!" and he bent down and grabbed him up, stuffing him away in his cargo pants pocket.
With his new prize secured, he entered the house, and headed straight for his room.
125.title: Not So BIg Kyle meets Not So Little Rory

142.content:
Cody had just got home from school, and he was bushed. He walked into his bedroom, and he wanted to relax, and play some video games. As he grabbed some games, he started to feel a bit weird. He then looked around, and saw a greenish mist coming into his room from an open window. He quickly walked over to the window to close, but he never made it. He fell to the, and passed out.

A few minutes later, he awoke. He felt strange, dizzy, and everything seemed weird. He saw what looked like a giant shoe in front of him. He then felt a cold breeze blowing against his skin, which snapped him out of his daze. He realized that he was now totally naked, and he figured this was some sick prank Zack was playing on him. He stood up, covered his private area with his hands, and looked around. His vision was still a little fuzzy, and he thought his eyes were still playing tricks on him. He saw his room, but it wasn’t his room. It must be some giant replica, he thought.

He then started to freak out, and paranoia was setting in. he was pretty good in math, and by his calculations, he was now only 3 inches tall, but that was impossible he thought. Then a door opened, and not wanting to be seen like this, he decided to hide behind his shoe. As he peeked out, he saw.....

info.brief_description: Choose a television show to shrink on! Go crazy!
info.description:
There will be a choice of several hit television, past and present. Pick a character and they get shrunk in their living room.

Anything goes, within reason, but I'd prefer not too much vore until at least ten chapters in.

GTS is permitted, but I'd prefer mainly CLEAN m/m interaction.

ENJOY! And watch your step!
